article_title: One Of The Great Anti-Obamacare Lies Exposed -- Data Proves ACA Not Responsible For Growth In Part-Time Jobs

article_metadata.description: (Photo credit: Wikipedia) One of the more popular economic myths spun by the anti-Obamacare forces is the suggestion that employers are avoiding the law by moving to an employee model based on part-time workers rather than full-time employees. For those committed to destroying the Affordable Care act by any means possible, who [...]
